vista.graph
Class PolyLineElement

java.lang.Object
  vista.graph.GraphicElement
      vista.graph.GEContainer
          vista.graph.PolyLineElement
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, Animate, Bounded, BoundedComposite, Composite, Drawable, DrawableComposite, FontResizable, Layoutable, ScaledElement
public class PolyLineElement
extends GEContainer
implements ScaledElement

This class draws a poly line using itself as a GEContainer to which the LineElement ( a graphic element ) is added at the appropriate places to simulate the line.

Version:
$Id: PolyLineElement.java,v 1.1 1999/12/29 17:16:18 nsandhu Exp $
Author:
Nicky Sandhu

PolyLineElement

public PolyLineElement(LineElementAttr attributes,
                       int[] xpoints,
                       int[] ypoints,
                       int npoints)
constructor. In addition to construction parameters of its parent class it has color, thickess and style as its parameters

Parameters:
lineColor - color of the line
thicknessMM - thickness of the line
lineStyle - dashed or solid line

drawThickLine

public final void drawThickLine(java.awt.Graphics g,
                                int x1,
                                int y1,
                                int x2,
                                int y2,
                                double t)
Simulates drawing of different thickness lines by using filled polygon.

Parameters:
g - Graphics on which to draw
x1 - The starting x co-ordinate of line
y1 - The starting y co-ordinate of line
x2 - The ending x co-ordinate of line
y2 - The ending y co-ordinate of line
t - The thickness of the line in pixels
